typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		movie
	)) ~> sink1
